BBC News app: Help guide for Android devices

3 Jul 2015

A help guide for users of version three of the BBC News app, on Android devices.

What's new in the BBC News app?

The new version of the app brings a richer and

more personalised experience of our news

content. You will find:

= More customisation - so you can follow the news you're interested in .

a Even more content in different formats - for example, more on demand video, easily identified with a play icon.

« Multiple levels of content - from world news to

national and regional content.
